title: Bug 134949 - Themes Nest in Other Library
description: Themes are nesting in another library. Details: Themes are nesting in another library. Step 1.
OB: Themes are incorrectly nesting in a library other than the expected one.
EB: Themes should not nest in libraries other than the designated one. They should follow the expected structure.
SR:
1. Open the application.
2. Navigate to the theme settings.
3. Observe the theme nesting behavior in libraries other than the designated one.
